name: avocado_price_analysis
description: Analyze avocado price trends and patterns
requirements: Analyze avocado price trends and patterns

turns.query: Analyze average avocado prices by type and year. Calculate the mean price for 'conventional' and 'organic' avocados for each year (2015-2018), then store the results in a DataFrame with years as index and type as columns

Find the top 5 regions with highest and lowest average avocado prices across all years and types. Store the highest priced regions in 'top_5_expensive_regions' and lowest priced regions in 'top_5_cheap_regions' as pandas Series with region names as index and average prices as values

Analyze seasonal price patterns. Group data by month (extract from Date column) and calculate average prices for conventional vs organic avocados. Create a DataFrame 'seasonal_prices' with months (1-12) as index and 'conventional' and 'organic' as columns. Also identify the month with highest price difference between organic and conventional, storing it as 'max_price_diff_month'

Perform volume-price correlation analysis. Calculate the correlation between 'Total Volume' and 'AveragePrice' for each avocado type separately. Store correlations as 'conventional_volume_price_corr' and 'organic_volume_price_corr'. Also find the region with the highest total volume sold across all years and types, storing it as 'highest_volume_region'

Conduct comprehensive market analysis: Create price volatility analysis by calculating the standard deviation of prices for each region-type combination, storing results in 'price_volatility' DataFrame with MultiIndex (region, type). Calculate year-over-year price growth rates for each type, storing in 'yoy_growth_rates' as a DataFrame with years as index and types as columns. Identify the most stable market (lowest price volatility) as 'most_stable_market' tuple (region, type). Finally, calculate the percentage of total volume that each bag size category (Small Bags, Large Bags, XLarge Bags) represents, storing as 'bag_size_distribution' Series
